short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Effortlessly manage and access your bookmarks with instant search, folder selection, and a shuffle feature for random picks.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
QuickAccess Bookmarks is a user-friendly Chrome extension designed to help you access and manage your favorite bookmarks effortlessly. With its seamless integration and customizable features, navigating through your bookmarks has never been more organized and efficient.

Key Features

Quickly access all your bookmarks from a single extension
Choose a specific bookmarks folder to display and work with
Instant search functionality for finding bookmarks easily
Shuffle feature to pick a random bookmark from your selection
Synchronize your preferences across multiple devices
